Disable all and simulate the no-op library and plugin
Force enabling our library for release builds of your app
Disable our overlay interface
Disable including this module sources in your apk
Disable source features and source inclusion
Disable opening our UI on device shake
Enable a permanent overlay icon to open our UI
Propagate unhandled exceptions to the default handler (for Crashlytics and similar)
Inject IadtEvents on logcat to see them on the standard Logcat output.
Enable debug mode for the library. It print extra logs and include our sources to your compilation
Compilation notes to show on initial dialog, build and team screen
Short name for your team, shown in home and team screen
Default email to use for reports
Long text about your team or anything else that you want to shown in team screen
Collection of links to shown in team screen. Use Groovy map of name:url
This is a internal compilation with additional tools included:
Privacy

This compilation contains tools that are locally recording your usage of this app. Only you can share these records by using our report feature.\n\nIf you don\'t know what this is or you are not agree, tap disable.
Permission

We require \'Draw over other apps\' permission to show our interface over your activity. We will never show it over other apps, only over your app.\n\nOn next screen: choose your app, allow it and press back button.
InAppDevTools enabled
You can open our interface at any time by shaking your app or using the floating bubble. Our interface will automatically pop up on crash.
Disable InAppDevTools
Your app need to be restarted for a clean startup without our tools.\n\nTip: You can re-enable them by cleaning this application data.
InAppDevTools require \'draw over other apps\' permission
